name: Suspicious Characters in CommandLine
description: Detects suspicious Unicode characters in the command line, which could be a sign of obfuscation or defense evasion
query: (process.command_line:(/.*ˣ.*/ OR /.*˪.*/ OR /.*ˢ.*/) OR process.command_line:(/.*∕.*/ OR /.*⁄.*/) OR process.command_line:(/.*―.*/ OR /.*—.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*ˣ* OR *˪* OR *ˢ*) OR process.command_line:(*∕* OR *⁄*) OR process.command_line:(*―* OR *—*))`
